```{r}
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(forecast)
```

```{r}
header <- read.csv("../Data/noaa_ch4_monthly.csv", skip = 45, header = FALSE)
header <- header[1, ]
methane <- read.csv("../Data/noaa_ch4_monthly.csv", skip = 47, header = FALSE)
colnames(methane) <- header
```


```{r}
methane_ts <-ts(methane$average_unc, start = c(1983,7), end = c(2023, 12), 
                frequency = 12)
autoplot(methane_ts)
```
